node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `autosave` ( `autosave_id` int unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `author_user` int NOT NULL, `node_id` int NOT NULL, `doctext` mediumtext COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci, `createtime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `save_type` enum('auto','manual') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'auto', PRIMARY KEY (`autosave_id`), KEY `idx_author_node` (`author_user`,`node_id`,`createtime`), KEY `idx_cleanup` (`author_user`,`node_id`,`autosave_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
node.title: autosave
